title: Inji Idupazhagi Lyrics Thevar Magan
stanzas:
marakkuma maman ennam
mayakkudhe panja varnam
madiyile oonjal
podu maane . vaa

Inji idupazhagi
manja sevappazhagi
kalla sirippazhagi
marakka manam
kooduthillaye yei..

punna vanathinile
peda kuyil koovayile
onnudaya vedhanaya
naan arinjen.

ungaluthil maalaiyida
onnirandu thozha thoda
enna thavam seenjeno
yen maamaa

vanna kili kayya thoda
chinna chinna kolamida
ullam mattum
unvazhiye naane
ullam mattum
unvazhiye naane

adikkura kaatha kelu
asaiyira naatha kelu
nadakkura aatha kelu
neethaanaa..
